title: Create an Astra DB Database
description:
See how to set up an Astra DB database. Astra DB is a multi-cloud DBaaS built on Apache Cassandra™, so you get all the benefits of Cassandra with none of the management hassle - and it's free! Check out the entire Astra playlist https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2g2h-wyI4SpWK1G3UaxXhzZc6aUFXbvL.

Try our Katacoda exercise for creating an Astra DB database for free here: https://katacoda.com/shallada/courses/astra-core-course/astra-creating-a-database

You can find documentation on creating an Astra DB database here: https://docs.datastax.com/en/astra/docs/creating-your-astra-database.html

CONNECT WITH DATASTAX
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/c/datastaxdevs?sub_confirmation=1 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/datastaxdevs
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/datastaxdevs

About DataStax:
DataStax is the company behind the massively scalable, highly available, cloud-native NoSQL data platform built on Apache Cassandra™. DataStax gives developers and enterprises the freedom to run data in any cloud, Kubernetes, hybrid or bare metal at global scale with zero downtime and zero lock-in. More than 450 of the world’s leading enterprises including Capital One, Cisco, Comcast, Delta Airlines, Macy’s, McDonald’s, Safeway, Sony, and Walmart use DataStax to build transformational data architectures for real-world outcomes. For more, visit DataStax.com and @DataStax.

About DataStax Developer:
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache Cassandra©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev for more free learning resources.

transcript.text: [Music] data sacs astrodb is a cassandra as a service offering which means you get all the benefits of cassandra with none of the management hassles want to create an astrodb database of course you do it takes about 60 seconds and it's free start by opening your browser to astra.datastax.com if you don't have an account with datastax you can sign in with either your google account or your github account or you can create a data sex account by clicking here the first time you sign in you'll see the screen that outlines three easy steps to create an astrodb app you can click on the try serverless today button here or click on the create database button here both buttons take you to the same place on this screen you can see what you get with your aster account the big win is the 25 credit so there's no need to enter a credit card we'll click to get started with the pay as you go plan which uses our 25 dollars of free credit now on this screen fill in your database name in your key space name a key space is a container of tables so name it something that reminds you of your schema select a cloud provider in a region and click the create database button then click on the notification you notice on this dashboard screen that the database is still initializing it may take a few minutes for the database to be completely initialized but you'll receive an email when it's ready that's all there is to it
